modShortDescription: This mod creates a TON of new player vending machines out of various vanilla decoration and loot containers. Wanna sell concrete at your store?
modDescription:
This mod creates a TON of new player vending machines out of various vanilla decoration and loot containers. Wanna sell concrete at your store? What better place to keep it than a concrete pile. This mod is DIRECTLY inspired by Immersive storage by Altorian.

Create a single item called ImmersiveVendorsVendingMachineHelper. Recipe requires 1 player vending machine.

Hit “R” to choose shape.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/aristrofl/7DaysToDieMods/tree/master/Immersive%20Vendors)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19327-aristrofls-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Aristrofl](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/aristrofl/), Altorian
